description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Create your own physics scenes.  Create tanks, catapults, spring guns, rope, ragdolls, cars, and whatever you can think of.  Add custom objects, springs, joints, and hinges and edit their properties.  Includes six examples which demonstrate just a few of the game's possibilities.
description.short: Create your own physics scenes.  Create tanks, catapults, spring guns, rope, ragdolls, cars, and whatever you can think of.  Add custom objects, springs, joints, and hinges and edit their properties.  Includes six examples which demonstrate just a few of the game's possibilities.
